title: Mintegral Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Mintegral adapter

video.description: An object defining additional Mintegral video parameters

width.description: Width of the screen resolution to decide orientation

height.description: Height of the screen resolution to decide orientation

skipdelay.description: The time to spend before revealing skip button

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest Mintegral endpoint

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by Mintegral

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by Mintegral
